languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, Артифекс-картограф утверждает, что нашел упоминание о ксеносах, с которыми мы столкнулись — согласно записям, их называют "некроны".
"Lord Captain, the Carto-Artifex claims to have found a mention of the xenos we have encountered. The records indicate that they are known as 'Necrons.'"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, Артифекс-картограф утверждает, что нашел упоминание о ксеносах, с которыми мы столкнулись — согласно записям, их называют "некроны".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the Carto-Artifex is claiming to have found a mention of the xenos we've encountered. Records indicate that they're known as 'Necrons.'"
"Lord Captain, the Carto-Artifex is claiming to have found a mention of the xenos we've encountered. Records indicate that they're known as 'Necrons.'"
"Lord Captain, the Carto-Artifex is claiming to have found a mention of the xenos we've encountered. The records indicate that they're known as 'Necrons.'"

"Lord Captain, the Carto-Artifex claims to have found a mention of the xenos we have encountered. The records indicate that they are known as 'Necrons.'"

languages.text: “舰长大人，档案管理员声称找到了我们遇到的那些异形。根据档案记载，那些异形被称为‘太空死灵’。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Carto-Artifex claims to have found a mention of the xenos we have encountered. The records indicate that they are known as 'Necrons.'"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，档案管理员声称找到了我们遇到的那些异形。根据档案记载，那些异形被称为‘太空死灵’。”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, le carto-artifex affirme avoir trouvé une mention des xénos que nous avons rencontrés. L'archive stipule qu'ils sont connus sous le nom de "Nécrons". »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Carto-Artifex claims to have found a mention of the xenos we have encountered. The records indicate that they are known as 'Necrons.'"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, le carto-artifex affirme avoir trouvé une mention des xénos que nous avons rencontrés. L'archive stipule qu'ils sont connus sous le nom de "Nécrons". »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, der Carto-Artifex glaubt, Erwähnungen der Xenos entdeckt zu haben, denen wir begegnet sind. Den Aufzeichnungen zufolge sind sie als 'Necrons' bekannt."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Carto-Artifex claims to have found a mention of the xenos we have encountered. The records indicate that they are known as 'Necrons.'"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, der Carto-Artifex glaubt, Erwähnungen der Xenos entdeckt zu haben, denen wir begegnet sind. Den Aufzeichnungen zufolge sind sie als 'Necrons' bekannt."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, el cartoartífice asegura haber encontrado una mención a xenos similares a los que hemos visto. Los registros indican que se les conoce como "necrones"».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Carto-Artifex claims to have found a mention of the xenos we have encountered. The records indicate that they are known as 'Necrons.'"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, el cartoartífice asegura haber encontrado una mención a xenos similares a los que hemos visto. Los registros indican que se les conoce como "necrones"».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、カルト・アーティフェックスは我々が遭遇した異種族の記録を発見したと言っています。記録では『ネクロン』と呼ばれています」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Carto-Artifex claims to have found a mention of the xenos we have encountered. The records indicate that they are known as 'Necrons.'"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、カルト・アーティフェックスは我々が遭遇した異種族の記録を発見したと言っています。記録では『ネクロン』と呼ばれています」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan; Haritakâr, karşılaştığımız yaratıklara benzeyen zenolarla ilgili bilgilere rastlamış. Kayıtlarda 'Nekron' diye geçiyorlarmış."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Carto-Artifex claims to have found a mention of the xenos we have encountered. The records indicate that they are known as 'Necrons.'"
